T02D2102:131b-1: dzny'a na satva manydzu shr'i sa m'a dhi tsa kra m'a na aa ba t'a ra n'a ma //
T02D2102:131b-3: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i yid 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
T02D2102:131b-4: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2102:131b-5: ston ka'i zla ltar dkar la dri ma med pa'i sku /
T02D2102:131b-6: rab tu sku mdzes gzhon nur bzhugs shing yid dang gnas //
T02D2102:131b-7: ye shes sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
T02D2102:131b-8: thugs kar bzhugs shing nyi ma stong ldan 'khor lo
T02D2102:131b-9: 'khrug / sems can khur khyer glang po de la
T02D2102:131b-10: phyag 'tshal te // rgyud kyi gsang sngags 'khor lo yid 'jug pa //
T02D2102:131b-11: glog gi phreng ba lta bus bdud tshogs zil gnon cing //
T02D2102:131b-12: bgegs dang log par 'dren par tshar gcod mtshon cha che //
T02D2102:131b-13: rigs lnga'i dpa' bo'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D2102:131b-14: dang po 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2102:132a-0: gnas khong yid du 'od zhing dben la bkra shis pa ltar @132a * //
T02D2102:132a-2: / sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la mchod bstod de //
T02D2102:132a-3: sngags kyi phreng ba lan bdun du brjod pa po //
T02D2102:132a-4: sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam sa bon la bsdus pas //
T02D2102:132a-5: 'og nas 'byung ba dang mthun pa yi skur gyur te //
T02D2102:132a-6: sngags kyi phreng ba 'di ma gal me'i 'khor lo lta bur stong phrag bcu'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2102:132a-7: aom sarba dharm'a aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shuddha badzra tsakshu /
T02D2102:132a-8: aa aa aom aa:pra kri ti pa ri shuddha /
T02D2102:132a-13: shuddhi ta mu pa da ye ti sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02D2102:132a-20: ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
T02D2102:132a-21: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:de dag bsnyen pa'o //
T02D2102:132a-22: de nas lhag pa'i ris kyi mdun du dam tshig dang chang sbyar ba'i mandal gru bzhi pa bya'o //
T02D2102:132a-23: de nas dkyil 'khor du me tog sngon po dri zhim pa spungs te /
T02D2102:132a-24: aom sarba dharma aa bh'a ba /
T02D2102:132a-25: sva bh'a ba bi shuddha dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:zhes lan bdun bzlas pas /
T02D2102:132a-26: 'jam dpal mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po rig pa dang ldan pa bskyed do //
T02D2102:132a-27: de nas me tog ser po dri zhim pa dang ldan pa lho'i ngos su spungs te /
T02D2102:132a-28: aom tsakshu aa aa a'am aa pra kri ti pa ri shuddha /
T02D2102:132a-29: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:zhes lan bdun bzlas pas /
T02D2102:132a-31: sku mdog ser po rig pa dang ldan pa bskyed do //
T02D2102:132a-32: de nas me tog dkar po dri zhim pa shar gyi ngos su spungs te /
T02D2102:132a-33: aom sarba dharm'a ya du ta sarba ta th'a ta dzny'a na k'a ya /
T02D2102:132a-34: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:zhes lan bdun bzlas pas /
T02D2102:132a-35: 'jam dpal rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po rig pa dang ldan pa bskyed do //
T02D2102:132a-36: de nas me tog dmar po dri zhim pa nub kyi phyogs su spungs te /
T02D2102:132a-37: aom manydzu shr'i shuddhi ta mu pa ta ye /
T02D2102:132a-38: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:zhes lan bdun du
T02D2102:132a-39: bzlas pas 'jam dpal 'od dpag tu med pa sku
T02D2102:132a-40: mdog dmar po rig pa dang ldan pa bskyed do
T02D2102:132a-41: // de nas me tog ljang ser dri zhim pa byang gi ngos su spungs te /
T02D2102:132a-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02D2102:132a-44: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:zhes lan bdun bzlas
T02D2102:132a-45: pas 'jam dpal don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang
T02D2102:132a-46: gu rig pa dang ldan pa bskyed do //
T02D2102:132b-0: de dag thams cad kyang zhal gsum pa phyag bzhi pa khro zhing cung zad @132b zhib ;
T02D2102:132b-1: / rin po che'i rgyan gyis spras pa'o //
T02D2102:132b-2: dang po ni sngo ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal can /
T02D2102:132b-7: gnyis pa ni dkar ba dang /
T02D2102:132b-13: gsum pa ni ser ba dang sngo ba dang /
T02D2102:132b-19: bzhi pa ni dmar ba dang /
T02D2102:132b-26: lnga pa ni ljang gu dang /
T02D2102:132b-33: yum rnams ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02D2102:132b-34: gcer bu skra grol zhing g-yon nas g-yas su 'khyud pa rdo rje'i dril bu dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2102:132b-35: de dag thams cad kyang sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgyan pa la bzhugs pa ste /
T02D2102:132b-36: rnam par snang mdzad ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D2102:132b-37: de nas rab tu gnas pa dang /
T02D2102:132b-40: rgyas gdab pa dag gis yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D2102:132b-41: mchod cing mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bstod pa brgya phrag bcu'i bar du byas te /
T02D2102:132b-42: de nas 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i pho brang
T02D2102:132b-43: du zhugs pa ni thun mtshams kyi de nyid de
T02D2102:132b-44: nye bar bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2102:132b-45: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa'i nang du /
T02D2102:132b-46: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag bzhi pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas te /
T02D2102:132b-48: nam mkha'i bdag po 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i snying gar bzhag ste /
T02D2102:132b-49: rigs kyi bsnyen pa ye shes sems dpa'i yang pho
T02D2102:132b-50: brang du ji srid spro'i bar du blangs shing go
T02D2102:132b-51: rims kyis khri phrag re re tshad du bya'o //
T02D2102:132b-52: thun mtshams su ni sngar dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bstod pa dag kyang byas te /
T02D2102:132b-54: de nas nam mkha'i pho brang ci 'byor pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya ste /
T02D2102:132b-55: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa chen po yang byas la /
T02D2102:132b-56: mtshan gyi bstod pa byas te /
T02D2102:132b-57: sangs rgyas gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa
T02D2102:132b-58: la bdag nyid kyis thabs dang shes rab yan lag
T02D2102:132b-60: aa thung du lam lus par rdzogs par bstim nas /
T02D2102:133a-0: @133a * // 'dod pa'i don chen po la rol na bde ba'i
T02D2102:133a-1: ye shes zad mi shes pa'i rang rig la skad
T02D2102:133a-2: cig de nyid la rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba
T02D2102:133a-3: ni / rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
T02D2102:133a-4: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //
T02D2102:133a-5: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje //
T02D2102:133a-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba //
T02D2102:133a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas //
T02D2102:133a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
T02D2102:133a-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
T02D2102:133a-10: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che //
T02D2102:133a-11: rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od //
T02D2102:133a-12: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
T02D2102:133a-14: rdo rje skyil klung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2102:133a-15: sangs rgyas ba gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa //
T02D2102:133a-16: dpal ldan sangs rgyas padma skyes //
T02D2102:133a-17: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa //
T02D2102:133a-19: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags rgyal //
T02D2102:133a-20: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
T02D2102:133a-21: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag / ces bya ba ni de'i bar du byed pa'o //
T02D2102:133a-22: rab tu gnas pa yang 'di nyid kyis bya ste /
T02D2102:133a-25: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os /
T02D2102:133a-26: bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
T02D2102:133a-28: srung ba'i 'khor lo ni nas dkar po'am ta la'i
T02D2102:133a-29: lo ma la dri zhim pa sna tshogs kyis byugs
T02D2102:133a-30: te / gur gum gyis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa
T02D2102:133a-31: mu khyud dang ldan pa bris la aom b'a g'i
T02D2102:133a-32: shva ri mum na ma sv'a h'a /
T02D2102:133a-40: sthi to hri di dzny'an m'urti /
T02D2102:133a-42: tyee ddh'a barti n'am ma ma raksha sv'a h'a /
T02D2102:133a-44: aom badzra t'iksha du:kha tstshe da pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye /
T02D2102:133a-45: dzny'a na k'a ya b'a g'i shva ra aa ra pa tsa na ya te n'a ma:raksha sv'a h'a /
T02D2102:133a-47: rigs kyi dang po ni lte ba'i khor yug tu'o //
T02D2102:133a-49: phreng sngags ni phyi'i mu khyud la'o //
T02D2102:133a-50: de la sngar bzhin bskyed de /
T02D2102:133a-51: cho ga rdzogs par byas nas 'khor lor gyur pa de spyi gtsug tu btags na /
T02D2102:133a-52: dus su 'chi ba'ang zlog par 'gyur te /
T02D2102:133a-53: gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D2102:133a-54: de dag ni sgrub pa chen po'o //
T02D2102:133a-55: bsod nams yongs rdzogs ye shes zla bzhin 'phel //
T02D2102:133a-56: bkra shis phun tshogs bstan pa yun ring rgyu //
T02D2102:133b-0: bdud dgra pha ma @133b par byed pa bsgrub thabs 'dis //
T02D2102:133b-1: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs grub shog / bdag ni blo dman rab 'byed rgyud la rmongs //
T02D2102:133b-2: dam pa snyan brgyud la brten tshig 'ga' zhig / bris pa 'di la blo bzang dang gyur na //
T02D2102:133b-3: rang gi bu bzhin khyed kyis bzod pa mdzod //
T02D2102:133b-4: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i yid 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba /
T02D2102:133b-5: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal ldan gnyis su med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
